channel.title: How to add items to shop?
channel.description: How do i add items to a shop like i new shop i made.

item.title: How to add items to shop?
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

[quote=“1 vitiello 1, post:4, topic:251158”]In client.java search for wanneshop, copy and past the above one and then set your npc id and shop to it, for example

if (NPCID == npcidhere) { //FisherShop skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; WanneShop = ShopIDHere; }

~i vitiello i~[/quote]
i’ve never seen that kind before

Read full topic
item.source: How to add items to shop?

item.title: How to add items to shop?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“si force, post:5, topic:251158”]The first number in shops.cfg is the NPCID,
That’s the first column.

Make sure to use tabs.[/quote]

I don’t know if Delta is different, but the first number is not the NPC ID; it’s the SHOP ID that you use to set up your wanneshop.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add items to shop?

item.title: How to add items to shop?
item.dc:creator: @1_vitiello_1 1 vitiello 1
item.description:
@1_vitiello_1 wrote:

In client.java search for wanneshop, copy and past the above one and then set your npc id and shop to it, for example

if (NPCID == npcidhere) { //FisherShop skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; WanneShop = ShopIDHere; }

~i vitiello i~
